title: Tomato & basil sauce
description: Save time and money with this simple and tasty sauce, great with pasta, meat or fish
ingredients: 1 tsp vegetable stock powder or ½ crumbled stock cube
steps: Heat the olive oil in a pan, add the garlic clove, then gently fry for 1 min.
Tip in the chopped tomatoes, vegetable stock powder, tomato purée and sugar, then bring to the boil. Reduce the heat, then simmer uncovered for 5 mins, stirring occasionally.
To finish, tear a few basil leaves, then stir into the sauce.
